channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- Connect:Direct Web Services
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- Connect:Direct Web Services

item.title: CVE-2021-38890|2024-08-04T01:51:20.822Z -- ibm -- connect%3Adirect%20web%20services
item.description: IBM Sterling Connect:Direct Web Services 1.0 and 6.0 uses an inadequate account lockout setting that could allow a remote attacker to brute force account credentials. IBM X-Force ID: 209507.

item.title: CVE-2021-38891|2024-08-04T01:51:20.697Z -- ibm -- connect%3Adirect%20web%20services
item.description: IBM Sterling Connect:Direct Web Services 1.0 and 6.0 uses weaker than expected cryptographic algorithms that could allow an attacker to decrypt highly sensitive information. IBM X-Force ID: 209508.
